org.foxlabs.validation.metadata

Class BeanDefinitionException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • java.lang.IllegalStateException
            • org.foxlabs.validation.metadata.BeanDefinitionException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class BeanDefinitionException
extends IllegalStateException
    Throw to indicate that a bean class has illegal validation definition.
    Author:
    Fox Mulder
    See Also:
    BeanMetaData, Serialized Form
